#cloud-config
users:
  - name: @@{centos.username}@@
    sudo: ['ALL=(ALL) NOPASSWD:ALL']
    ssh_pwauth: True
    disable_root: false
chpasswd:
  list: |
    root:@@{root.secret}@@
    @@{centos.username}@@:@@{centos.secret}@@
  expire: False
